languages.text: "Император защищает, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Если кто-то, кого вы любите, сейчас в беде — пусть и их защитит".
"The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."
languages.original_text: "Император защищает, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Если кто-то, кого вы любите, сейчас в беде — пусть и их защитит".

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."
"The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."
"The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."
"The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."
"The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."
"The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."

languages.text: "Der Imperator schützt uns, {mf|Lord|Lady}. Wenn jemand, den Ihr liebt, gerade in Schwierigkeiten steckt, möge er auch ihn schützen."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperator schützt uns, {mf|Lord|Lady}. Wenn jemand, den Ihr liebt, gerade in Schwierigkeiten steckt, möge er auch ihn schützen."

languages.text: « Que l'Empereur vous protège, Votre Seigneurie... et si quelqu'un que vous aimez a des ennuis, qu'il le protège aussi. »
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."

traits.locale_text: « Que l'empereur vous protège, Votre Seigneurie... et si quelqu'un que vous aimez a des ennuis, qu'il le protège aussi. »

languages.text: “愿帝皇保佑您，大人。如果您的爱人也遇到了麻烦，愿帝皇也保佑那个人。”
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."

traits.locale_text: “愿帝皇保佑您，大人。如果您的爱人也遇到了麻烦，愿帝皇也保佑那个人。”

languages.text: 「皇帝がお守りくださいます、陛下。今、陛下の愛する者が苦しんでいるならば、その者にも等しく皇帝の加護がありますよう」
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝がお守りくださいます、閣下。今、閣下の愛する者が苦しんでいるならば、その者にも等しく皇帝の加護がありますよう」

languages.text: «El Emperador protege, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Si un ser querido está en apuros en este momento, que Él lo proteja también».
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."

traits.locale_text: «El Emperador protege, mi{mf|lord|lady}». Si un ser querido está en apuros en este momento, que Él lo proteja también».

languages.text: "İmparator korur {mf|lordum|leydim}. Sizin de bir sevdiğinizin başı beladaysa onu da korusun."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects, my {mf|lord|lady}. If someone you love is in trouble right now, may He protect them too."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator korur {mf|lordum|leydim}. Sizin de bir sevdiğinizin başı beladaysa onu da korusun."
